description:
Defending males in women’s sports is bad enough but to claim this must be done to advance women’s rights is a slap in the face to the people who fought for equality for so long. So while it’s not possible to make special rights for a fraction of the population without trumping the rights of half the population, one woke Superintendent feels this is still the morally superior thing to do, which he claimed was similar to the fight for women's suffrage.

A Maine Superintendent is reaffirming his commitment to allowing males in female spaces by comparing it to things like the civil rights movement.

WATCH: Portland, ME Public Schools Superintendent Ryan Scallon says pushback against biological males in girls' sports reminds him of pushback against women's suffrage and ci
title: Woke Superintendent rants that keeping boys out of girls' sports is just like... women's sufferage

description:
Domestic terrorism is on the rise among radical leftists as Tesla dealerships are being burned and vandalized across the country. Today’s show breaks it down.

"The left tried to tell you that the biggest threat as far as domestic terrorism was White supremacists in this country," Crowder said. "Right now, political violence is rearing its head across this country all over again."

title: Watch: Why Domestic Terrorism is a Leftist Phenomenon

description:
While Jasmine Crockett, will be a year older on March 29, she will certainly not be a year wiser, as this is someone who appears to get dumber with age.

According to an exclusive video obtained by Laura Loomer, Crockett spoke on a Tesla Takedown call where she said her only birthday wish is for "Elon to be taken down.”

title: Jasmine Crockett caught on video cheering on leftists organizing vandalism and attacks against Tesla owners

description:
Leftists are ramping up domestic terrorism as Tesla owners are being doxxed and dealerships are being burned and vandalized across America, the Late Night left has encouraged more violence, it’s Time to Close for the Department of Education, how we tricked the Blaze into sharing an antisemitic meme yesterday on X, NBC News found out white women are ruining society, Bill Burr was on The View this morning, and more!

title: Sources: Why Domestic Terrorism is a Leftist Phenomenon

description:
There are few people more deserving of ridicule than unironic influencers. It's pronounced "in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr" as if you are a valley girl from the 80s. So when there is a dispute in a park between an old man sitting on a bench and an in-flu-ence-rrrrrrrrrr carrying on about her live stream, the old man is always in the right.

The low-key best part about the video is how ridiculous some of the words said online sound when part of an IRL conversation.

The word “hero” gets thrown around a lot these days. pic.twitter.com/CB6yTOB3VS
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) March 20, 2025
title: Smug 'influencer' whines old man is ruining her livestream as he lets her know how little he gives a rip

description:
You may have heard of the concept of a 15-minute city and are wondering what one is. Here is a farmer to explain with chickens.

Before we start, the idea of a "15-minute city" tends to be fodder for conspiracy theorists. As if there is a grand cabal of global elites looking to control people by limiting them to a fifteen-minute radius and use other dystopian methods to control every aspect of their lives. Get those dark thoughts out of your head.

  • WEF globalist runs from reporter after bragging he was going to track where you go and what you eat: "It was just an idea"
title: Farmer uses his chickens to illustrate progressives' terrifying plans for how we are "allowed" to live our lives
